hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

to have a skill/to have a lot on the ball/to have an affair
to take care of a matter all by oneself/to run the whole show
lit. to hide the sky with one hand/to hide the truth from the masses
to show off one's abilities/to exhibit one's skills

sentences.english: My friend Dai Kui plays the zither so well.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友戴逵弹得一手好琴。

sentences.english: And its impact is the same in a certain period of time after single-handedly a new show.
sentences.chinese: 其影响是相同的在某一段时间后，一手一个新的显示。

sentences.english: However, every couple hundred hands, a BIG decision comes along that is also a difficult decision.
sentences.chinese: 然而，每数百手就会有一手大而且难的决定出现。

sentences.english: Unless you're managing to capture your entire market single-handed, then doesn't the concept of affiliation spring to mind?
sentences.chinese: 除非你是想一手抓住整个市场，难道你没有从属概念？

sentences.english: He heehawed and said everything had been arranged only by him.
sentences.chinese: 他狂笑着说所有这一切都是他一手策划安排的。

sentences.english: The audience were spell-bound by his playing of percussion instruments accompanied with his singing.
sentences.chinese: 他一手打着简板，一边唱着曲，观众都听得很入迷。
让我给你露一手，开开眼。

sentences.english: This manoeuvre of his is a diabolical conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 他这一手是一个居心叵测的大阴谋。

sentences.english: She kept lifting handfuls of fine sand and letting it pour through her fingers.
sentences.chinese: 她不停捧起一手细沙，又让它们顺着手指流下去。

sentences.english: He extended along to see an outside and started to grip a duck leg to bite all alone.
sentences.chinese: 他探头看看外面，一手抓起鸭腿咬了一口。

sentences.english: Could one hand work when being apart from the whole body?
sentences.chinese: 工作时，可以一手除了作为整体的身体吗？

sentences.english: Do you want to get the first barrel of gold before someone else.
sentences.chinese: 是否想走到别人前面，赚到第一手钱呢？

sentences.english: The company went to the end under his sole authority.
sentences.chinese: 公司在他的一手遮天之下走到了尽头。

sentences.english: Helpless, shine on a demon mirror to only have crustily skin of head, skill hold bomb to arrive at before.
sentences.chinese: 无奈，照妖镜只有硬着头皮，一手托着炸弹来到阵前。

sentences.english: Small qian incarnation book fairy meet, hand to tear to refuse his love poem.
sentences.chinese: 小倩化身簿仙子相见，一手将情诗撕毁拒绝他的情意。
